original_text: If you do that, you will be thinking a lot about heaven. That is where you will have stored your valuable things.’
korean_text: 너희 보물 있는 곳에는 너희 마음도 있으리라

sentences.original_text: you will be thinking a lot about heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 천국에 대해 많이 생각하게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: you will have stored your valuable things
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 소중한 것들을 저장해 둘 곳입니다
